Soil disturbance of at least
50 cubic yards of soil
within the Maher Area.

Refer applicant to complete
Attachment 3
Examples of soil disturbance include
grading, excavating, trenching,
cut/fill, landscaping, planting, digging,
burying, removing topsoil, etc. Refer
to Information Sheet G-14
// Required for projects within the
OCII areas, route to OCII instead of
Planning

Soil disturbance of any
volume within the Health
Code Article 31 Area.

Refer applicant to complete
Attachment 3
Sites within the Health Code Article
31 Area will note “Health Code
Article 31 Restrictions Apply” under
zoning information in a PIM property
search.
(Examples of soil disturbance include
grading, excavating, trenching,
cut/fill, landscaping, planting, digging,
burying, removing topsoil,
etc.https://sfdbi.org/sites/default/files/
IS G-14.pdf)
